DOC.brief_summary: Phase II Trial Hypofractionated Intensity Modulated Radiation Therapy ( IMRT ) With Temozolomide Granulocyte-macrophage Colony-stimulating Factor ( GM-CSF ) Patients With Newly Diagnosed Glioblastoma Multiforme .
